name: Cinemoji
description:
Test your deduction skills and your cinema knowledge

Unlock new levels with hits

Each level has a category

Some filmemojis are hard to guess

Features:


  • 200 handcrafted filmemojis to guess.
  • 40 levels with 5 filmemoji.
  • Each level belongs to one of the following categories: classic, horror, action, comedy, thriller, romance, drama, adventure, science fiction, animation, western, fantasy, biography, musical, cult, miscelaneous and hard.
  • It's pretty hard to guess alone all filmemojis.
  • Has hidden achievments...
